actions.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A014) Agreed to by recorded vote: 317 - 105 (Roll no. 260).
Amendment (A014) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A014) Agreed to by recorded vote: 317 - 105 (Roll no. 260).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A014) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.

description: An amendment numbered 14 printed in Part B of House Report 116-109 to increase and decrease by $10,000,000 funding to support greater diversity in the pool of diabetes research professionals and patients participating in clinical trials.
purpose: Amendment redirects $10 million in funding to support greater diversity in the pool of diabetes research professionals and patients participating in clinical trials.
